GetMySpacesRequest.description: Get my owned spaces only by type

owner.description: Owner of the space. If null, the requester will be the owner

appHolder.description: App Id. If null, the app holder from current token will be used
App Id. If null, the app holder from current token will be used

ownerId.description: Id of the user who is creating the organization. If not provided, the requester will be used.

owner.description: Owner of the group. If null, the requester will be the owner

maxActiveBookingsPerUserOrGroup.description: Maximum number of active bookings per user or group in the period of time defined by MaxActiveBookingsPeriodDays

userIdOfKeyHolder.description: User id of the key holder. If null, the key will be generated for the current user.

owner.description: Owner of this key. If null, the requester will be the owner
Owner of the AccessMean. If null, the requester will be the owner

customerIdentificationCode.description: This is an internal user id. It can be used to give a custom Id to this access point for identification inside a building etc.

accessPointCreationPermissionOptions.description: If not defined, No access will be granted by default

JWTBearerAuth.description: Enter a JWT token to authorize the requests...
